articles.description: In her announcement about her pending retirement, Serena Williams says biology isn't "fair."
articles.content:
Serena Williams recently said that she plans to retire. In her announcement that she will walk away from tennis after this month’s U.S. Open, Williams made some eyebrow-raising comments.
